summary: A spectral warhound replacement for Vigilance and/or Barbas.
descriptionHtml:
The powerful Vigilance and the immortal Barbas are remodelled to appear as if Vigilance truly followed you to Oblivion and back and Barbas was the hound of a daedric prince. I was personally disappointed at the appearance of Barbas and thought it didn\'t represent a powerful hound as it should. There are two main files that are compatible with one another, one to remodel Vigilance and the other for Barbas. 
  Other mods that edit Barbas\' follow distance are compatable, I have added the links. Pick your favourite.
Back of Barbas: http:skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2686
Less Annoying Barbas: http:skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22703

[size=5]Vigilance[/size]

[u]Stats:[/u]
Speed=115
Level min of 20 and max 100
Leveled with player x2
10 Base Health 
20 Base Stamina
Is essential
Class=Animal Predator
Regen Health in Combat

15 Two-handed
45 Archery
61 Block
15 Smithing

15 Light armour

15 illusion
15 Alteration

Happy
Foolhardy

50 Energy

author: The Mad Meister
